greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Let R = Z((1+sqrt{5})/2) denote the ring of integers in the real quadratic number field of discriminant 5. Then a(n) is the number of ways of writing a totally positive element of norm n as a sum of three squares in R, or 0 if there is no totally positive element of norm n.
comment: The terms were computed with the aid of Magma by David Durstoff, Nov 11 2015. See A263849 for further information.
reference: Maass, Hans. Über die Darstellung total positiver Zahlen des Körpers R (sqrt(5)) als Summe von drei Quadraten, Abhandlungen aus dem Mathematischen Seminar der Universität Hamburg. Vol. 14. No. 1, pp. 185-191, 1941.
xref: Cf. A263849 (another version of this sequence), A031363, A035187.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 18 2015
